articles.title: Fans go wild over African singer's 'best ever' rendition of Advance Australia Fair at Bledisloe Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: David Nduwimana sang Advance Australia Fair before the third match of the rugby series between the Australian Wallabies and New Zealand All Blacks at ANZ Stadium on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Rugby fans hailed an African singer's version of the Australian national anthem at the Bledisloe Cup the 'best ever'.
